    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static List<String> readLines(String path)
      Reading text from a file or resource is done everywhere, but a common implementation is missing from ctakes.
      static String readText(String path)
      Reading text from a file or resource is done everywhere, but a common implementation is missing from ctakes.

      Writing text to a file is done everywhere, but a common implementation is missing from ctakes.

    • Method Detail

      • readText

        public static String readText(String path)
                       throws IOException
        Reading text from a file or resource is done everywhere, but a common implementation is missing from ctakes.
        Parameters:
        path - for file or resource.
        Returns:
        a single string of text from the file.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the resource cannot be read.

      • readLines

        public static List<String> readLines(String path)
                              throws IOException
        Reading text from a file or resource is done everywhere, but a common implementation is missing from ctakes.
        Parameters:
        path - for file or resource.
        Returns:
        a list containing each line of text in the file.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the resource cannot be read.

      • writeText

        public static void writeText(String text,
                             String filepath)
                      throws IOException
        Writing text to a file is done everywhere, but a common implementation is missing from ctakes.
        Parameters:
        text - to be written.
        filepath - for output file.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the file cannot be written.
